languages.text: "Что за уничижительное сравнение, мон-кай. Ты — зов Сай'лантреш в телесной оболочке, что в любой момент может разорвать вуаль. Мы похожи так же, как снежные вершины и грязь под ногами".

"A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."
languages.original_text: "Что за уничижительное сравнение, мон-кай. Ты — зов Сай'лантреш в телесной оболочке, что в любой момент может разорвать вуаль. Мы похожи так же, как снежные вершины и грязь под ногами".

traits.locale_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

"A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

"A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

"A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

languages.text: “这样的比喻是在侮辱我，猴子。你们只是赛·兰斯雷什的邪念灌注而成的肉体凡胎，你随时随地都会撕裂那道面纱。在我看来，我和你的区别就像山巅的积雪与鞋底的尘埃。”
languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

traits.locale_text: “这样的比喻是在侮辱我，猴子。你们只是赛·兰斯雷什的邪念灌注而成的肉体凡胎，你随时随地都会撕裂那道面纱。在我看来，我和你的区别就像山巅的积雪与鞋底的尘埃。”

languages.text: « Vous m'insultez, mon-keigh. Vous incarnez l'appel de Sai'lanthresh et pourriez déchirer le voile à tout moment. Vous et moi sommes aussi semblables que le sommet d'une montagne enneigée et un grain de poussière collé sous une semelle. »
languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'insultez, mon-keigh. Vous incarnez l'appel de Sai'lanthresh et pourriez déchirer le voile à tout moment. Vous et moi sommes aussi semblables que le sommet d'une montagne enneigée et un grain de poussière collé sous une semelle. »

languages.text: "Ein erniedrigender Vergleich, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr seid der Ruf von Sai'lanthresh in einer körperlichen Hülle — Ihr könntet den Schleier jederzeit zerfetzen. Wir sind uns so ähnlich wie ein schneebedeckter Berggipfel und Dreck an der Sohle eines Schuhs."
languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

traits.locale_text: "Ein erniedrigender Vergleich, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr seid der Ruf von Sai'lanthresh in einer körperlichen Hülle — Ihr könntet den Schleier jederzeit zerfetzen. Wir sind uns so ähnlich wie ein schneebedeckter Berggipfel und Dreck an der Sohle eines Schuhs."

languages.text: 「下品な比較だ、モン＝ケイ。あなたは肉体の殻に包まれたセランスレッシュの呼び声。いつベールを破ってもおかしくない。私たちは雪の山頂と靴底の土ほど似ている」
languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

traits.locale_text: 「下品な比較だ、モン＝ケイ。あなたは肉体の殻に包まれたセランスレッシュの呼び声。いつベールを破ってもおかしくない。私たちは雪の山頂と靴底の土ほど似ている」

languages.text: «Es una comparación insultante, mon-keigh. Eres la llamada de Sai'lanthresh en forma corpórea... podrías desgarrar el velo en cualquier momento. Nos parecemos tanto como un pico nevado de montaña y el barro de la suela de un zapato».
languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

traits.locale_text: «Es una comparación insultante, mon-keigh. Eres la llamada de Sai'lanthresh en forma corpórea... podrías desgarrar el velo en cualquier momento. Nos parecemos tanto como un pico nevado de montaña y el barro de la suela de un zapato».

languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

languages.text: "Aşağılayıcı bir karşılaştırma bu mon-keigh. Sen, Sai'lanthresh'in çağrısının cismani hâlisin. Örtüyü her an yırtıp atabilirsin. Birbirimize ancak karlı bir dağ zirvesi ile ayakkabının tabanındaki çamur kadar benziyoruz."
languages.original_text: "A degrading comparison, mon-keigh. You are the call of Sai'lanthresh in a corporeal shell — you could tear the veil apart at any moment. We are as alike as a snowy mountain peak and dirt on the sole of a shoe."

traits.locale_text: "Aşağılayıcı bir karşılaştırma bu mon-keigh. Sen, Sai'lanthresh'in çağrısının cismani hâlisin. Örtüyü her an yırtıp atabilirsin. Birbirimize ancak karlı bir dağ zirvesi ile ayakkabının tabanındaki çamur kadar benziyoruz."
